'''Bullet Barnacles''' are an underwater exploration mechanic in [[Fontaine]].

They periodically deal damage to the player when near. Use the [[Armored Crab Shield]] ability to reduce damage taken, and use the counterattack to destroy the barnacle.

Bullet Barnacles are a type of [[Fontemer Aberrant]], and they are enemies with Armored Crabs.<ref>{{Ref/Loading|Fontaine|Great Terrestrial Lake}}</ref>
